info.description:
I'm sure I can reduce this shader even further.
I suggest we have a Shadertoy QUARTER Tweet (35 chars) competition ... We'll call it 0.25TC   ;-)
If Shadertoy ever had a way of sorting shaders by size, I wanted to have the smallest shader!  :-P
info.name: SMALLEST Shader! 31 chars
